mapper.insert: insert into payment_detail (paydetailcode, deductcode, paycode, deductpay, usestatus) values (#{payDetailCode},#{deductCode},#{payCode}, nvl(#{deductPay, jdbcType=VARCHAR},null), #{useStatus})
mapper.select: select paydetailcode, deductcode, paycode, deductpay, usestatus from payment_detail
select paydetailcode, deductcode, paycode, deductpay, usestatus from payment_detail where paydetailcode = #{payDetailCode}
select paydetailcode, deductcode, paycode, deductpay, usestatus from payment_detail where usestatus = #{useStatus}
